projects.description: A cyberpunk-inspired, interactive command-line interface (CLI) resume. Features a cinematic boot sequence, idle protocol (Matrix screensaver), and a theme engine.

testimonials.position: TECHNOLOGY DELIVERY ASSOC. LEAD MANAGER / ACCENTURE
testimonials.comments: Ranjith serves as a senior developer and technical lead for the WPD/CMA MUT Modernization program. Additionally, he has mentored and supported over 4 ASEs in Angular, ensuring timely completion of tasks. Ranjith's dedication and quick learning abilities make him a valuable resource.
